main event: An observer reported seeing a bright white light hovering near Norwood, Massachusetts on 16 or 17 March 1966.
interesting points: The reported object was described as a bright white light hovering about 30 to 50 yards away from the observer., The sighting lasted for several seconds., The object took off at a terrific rate of speed., The report was deemed unreliable due to the observer's high amount of imagination., The observer's questionnaire indicated the object appeared solid and emitted a sound similar to a whistle.
witness description: an observer who reported the sighting, believed to be a child or minor
